title: Azure Artifacts Quick FQR Guide
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Artifacts issues

requiredFields:
Clarify the scope of the issue
  Is the issue related to Build Artifacts or Azure Artifacts?

Determine when the issue occurs
  Does it happen during artifact generation, downloading, or publishing?

Identify the pipeline context
  • What task is being used?
  • Is the issue in a Build or Release pipeline?
  • If related to Release, gather both Build and Release pipeline logs with debug enabled.

Capture error details
  • Are there any error messages?
  • Provide the exact error text.
  • Upload screenshots of the errors to DTM.

Check billing tier
  • Is the Azure Artifacts billing tier Free or Paid?
  • If Paid, what is the artifacts usage limit?

Verify feed location
  Is the feed located in the same project or a different project?

Review feed permissions
  What are the permissions set on the Artifact Feed?

Upload logs
  Ensure debug-enabled logs are uploaded.

Include package configuration files
  Attach any relevant package config files.
```
